english.segment1: This is what we want. You know we had to wait a good while. This is what we need. To live out all the love that we read
english.segment2: This aint no new kinda story
english.segment3: Things are not that bad. You know we had a hell of a dad. This is what we need. To live out all the love that we read
english.segment4: This ain't no new kinda story
